definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: The Allosaurus was a meat eater.
It had a big brain and was a smart dinosaur.
sentences.chinese: 異特龍有個大腦袋，所以它挺聰明。

sentences.english: The Allosaurus walked on two feet, but was slow. The Allosaurus could run.
sentences.chinese: 異特龍是兩條腿走路，但走的很慢，它也能跑。
